Docs.summary: This API supports the Entity Framework Core infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. This API may change or be removed in future releases.

Docs.summary: Navigation property '{navigation}' on entity type '{entityType}' is mapped without a CLR property. UseLazyLoadingProxies requires all entity types to be public, unsealed, have virtual navigation properties, and have a public or protected constructor.

Docs.summary: UseLazyLoadingProxies requires AddEntityFrameworkProxies to be called on the internal service provider used.
